page.title: 07 Seaton's Tramway
page.content: Many years ago a railway came to Seaton. Now it is closed down and there is a{Tramway}which runs on those same tracks. It runs from Seaton's Harbour road car_park on to the White Hart Inn. Then the Tram runs up to Colyton. The Tram runs along the river Axe, you can see a lot of Seaton, Axmouth, the concrete bridge and all the bird life of the River Axe. The trip costs about Â£1.80 for adults return, Â£1.30 for childrens return. The Tram trip is very enjoyable for photographers, bird lovers and even for everyone who goes on the Tram. There is a good range of Trams in Seaton. The only other running Tram is in Blackpool.
